titles.title: A bill expressing the sense of the Senate that the United States should initiate negotiations to enter into a free trade agreement with the country of Georgia.
A bill expressing the sense of the Senate that the United States should initiate negotiations to enter into a free trade agreement with the country of Georgia.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the United States should initiate negotiations to enter into a free trade agreement with the Republic of Georgia.
